title: To Live and die in L.A.
creator_credit: William Friedkin, Irving H. Levin, SLM and New Century
brief_description: This action packed movie centres around two LA cops, one who eventually gets killed in the line of duty and the other who seeks his partner’s revenge. Stars William L. Petersen, Willem Dafoe, John Pankow, Debra Feuer, John Turturro, Dean Stockwell and Robert Downey Snr. Based on the novel by Gerald Petievich.
